# GitHub Copilot Instructions

This repository contains default community health files and GitHub Actions workflows for the marmoos-project organization.

## Repository Purpose

This is a special `.github` repository that provides default community health files (like CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md, CONTRIBUTING.md, SECURITY.md, etc.) that apply to all public repositories in the marmoos-project organization that don't have their own versions of these files.

## Guidelines for Contributors

### Code Style and Standards

- Use clear, descriptive file names
- Follow Markdown best practices for documentation files
- Ensure all links are valid and up-to-date
- Use proper heading hierarchy in Markdown files

### File Organization

- Community health files should be placed in the root directory
- GitHub Actions workflows should be placed in `.github/workflows/`
- Templates (issue/PR) should be placed in `.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/` or `.github/PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE/`

### Documentation

- Keep documentation concise and focused
- Use examples where appropriate
- Update documentation when making changes to templates or workflows

### Best Practices

- Test any GitHub Actions workflows before committing
- Validate Markdown syntax
- Consider the impact on all repositories in the organization when making changes
- Follow GitHub's recommendations for community health files

## Additional Context

Since this is an organizational `.github` repository, changes here affect all repositories in the marmoos-project organization. Please be thoughtful about modifications and ensure they provide value across the organization.
